SMRP¶

Module for MRP-based spatial interpolation.

class MRPinterpolation.SMRP.SD_SMRP(grid, gamma=0.9)¶

Bases: MRPinterpolation.SMRP.SMRP

Class for SD-SMRP, extending SMRP

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

gammafloat

discount parameter gamma used by SD-MRP (typically 0-1)

run():

Runs SD-MRP

set_gamma():

Sets gamma to a user-specified value

find_gamma():

Automatically determines the best gamma (using subsampling or a training set)

compute_confidence():

compute an indication of uncertainty per pixel in pred_grid

compute_confidence(iterations=100)¶

Gives a confidence indication (float 0-1) for all cells in the grid by running a sub-MRP interpolation process on a grid where the confidence for known values is set to 1.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for running the sub-MRP

Returns

confidence indication per pixel

find_gamma(search_epochs, subsample_proportion, iterations=100, ext=None)¶

Automatically sets gamma to the best found value. Currently only supports random search.

Parameters

  • search_epochs – number of epochs used by the random search

  • subsample_proportion – proportion of training data used to compute errors

  • iterations – number of MRP interations used by the random search

Returns

best found value for gamma

run(iterations)¶

Runs SD-SMRP for the specified number of iterations.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for the state value update function

Returns

interpolated grid pred_grid

set_gamma(gamma)¶

Sets gamma to the manually supplied value.

Parameters

gamma – user-supplied gamma value

class MRPinterpolation.SMRP.SMRP(grid)¶

Bases: object

Basic class implementing basic functions used by SD-MRP and WP-MRP.

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

reset():

Returns pred_grid and G to their original state

to_graph():

Converts original_grid to a graph representation

update_grid():

Updates pred_grid to reflect changes to G

get_pred_grid():

Returns pred_grid

get_pred_grid()¶

Return pred_grid

mean_absolute_error(true_grid, gridded=False)¶

Compute the mean absolute error of pred_grid given true_grid as ground truth

Parameters

  • true_grid – ground truth for all grid cells

  • gridded – optional Boolean specifying whether to return an error grid with the MAE

Returns

mean absolute error, optionally a tuple of MAE and per-cell error

reset()¶

Return prediction grid and graph representation to their original form

to_graph(default_E=0)¶

Converts a grid to graph form.

Parameters

default_E – default expected value used for initialisation of the MRP

update_grid()¶

Update pred_grid to reflect changes to G

class MRPinterpolation.SMRP.WP_SMRP(grid, feature_grid, model)¶

Bases: MRPinterpolation.SMRP.SMRP

Class for WP-SMRP, extending SMRP

original_grid2D numpy array

the original grid supplied to be interpolated

pred_grid2D numpy array

interpolated version of original_grid

feature_grid3D numpy array

grid corresponding to original_grid, with feature vectors on the z-axis

Gnetworkx directed graph

graph representation of pred_grid

modelsklearn-based prediction model

user-supplied machine learning model used to predict weights

run():

Runs WP-MRP

train():

Train supplied prediction model on subsampled data or a training set

compute_confidence():

compute an indication of uncertainty per pixel in pred_grid

compute_confidence(iterations=100)¶

Gives a confidence indication (float 0-1) for all cells in the grid by running a sub-MRP interpolation process on a grid where the confidence for known values is set to 1.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for running the sub-MRP

Returns

confidence indication per pixel

run(iterations)¶

Runs WP-SMRP for the specified number of iterations.

Parameters

iterations – number of iterations used for the state value update function

Returns

interpolated grid pred_grid

train(train_grid=None, train_features=None)¶

Trains WP-SMRP’s weight prediction model on either subsampled data from original_grid and feature_grid, or a user-supplied training grid with corresponding features.

Parameters

  • train_grid – optional user-specified training grid

  • train_features – optional user-specified training feature grid
